lead_paragraph: A taxidermist discovers a video cassette in the stomach of a wild boar that he has gutted and plans to preserve. His daughter, Réalité, discovers the tape in the trash and becomes intent on watching it.
snippet: A taxidermist discovers a video cassette in the stomach of a wild boar that he has gutted and plans to preserve. His daughter, Réalité, discovers the tape in the trash and becomes intent on watching it.
